title: 编写代码时，如何确定某类或某方法是运行在客户端还是服务端？
author: akbingo0605
txt_content: 看了Forge文档，还是一知半解，不是很清楚

replies.author: akbingo0605
replies.txt_content: 问这个问题为了知道注解@SideOnly(value)里面的值应该填哪一个

可以看看一些文章:
https://www.minecraftforge.net/f ... ot-to-use-sideonly/
https://mcforge.readthedocs.io/en/latest/concepts/sides/

replies.author: ddee
replies.txt_content:
Side.CLIENT 客户端
Side.SERVER 服务器
